title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 645-5.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 645-5.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Subpart applies to applications for all permits
which are issued by the commission or its designee. The commission may
designate the executive director of the commission as its agent to issue
permits of a ministerial nature. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
645-5.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
